short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just one click for minimize a live latency!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minimize the latency of the lives on Twitch by clicking on the button to participate in real time with the community!

This extension ignores the loaded buffer and jumps directly to the most recent streamed video possible. Shows also an alert when the delay is excessive that can be disabled/enabled through the icon's context menu.
